instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1707: What is A1707? A1707 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Late 2016, Mid 2017 with EMC 3072, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00281, 820-00928..

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1707</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> fan spped , touch bar end restart
threads.message:
they changed the keyboard, now the touchbar doesn't work
comes back on and off.

the left fan goes 1000
i checked q600 / 50 the pp3v is present
I checked the resistances and they are not burned
I have not tried with another fan.

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1707</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> fan spped , touch bar end restart
threads.message: Check for knocked off components, broken traces, damaged connectors.
